testcase.name: MemoryTool > setGeminiMdFilename > should update currentGeminiMdFilename when a valid new name is provided
MemoryTool > setGeminiMdFilename > should not update currentGeminiMdFilename if the new name is empty or whitespace
MemoryTool > setGeminiMdFilename > should handle an array of filenames
MemoryTool > performAddMemoryEntry (static method) > should create section and save a fact if file does not exist
MemoryTool > performAddMemoryEntry (static method) > should create section and save a fact if file is empty
MemoryTool > performAddMemoryEntry (static method) > should add a fact to an existing section
MemoryTool > performAddMemoryEntry (static method) > should add a fact to an existing empty section
MemoryTool > performAddMemoryEntry (static method) > should add a fact when other ## sections exist and preserve spacing
MemoryTool > performAddMemoryEntry (static method) > should correctly trim and add a fact that starts with a dash
MemoryTool > performAddMemoryEntry (static method) > should handle error from fsAdapter.writeFile

testcase.name: MemoryTool > execute (instance method) > should have correct name, displayName, description, and schema
MemoryTool > execute (instance method) > should call performAddMemoryEntry with correct parameters and return success for global scope
MemoryTool > execute (instance method) > should call performAddMemoryEntry with correct parameters and return success for project scope
MemoryTool > execute (instance method) > should return an error if fact is empty
MemoryTool > execute (instance method) > should handle errors from performAddMemoryEntry

testcase.name: MemoryTool > execute (instance method) > should return error when executing without scope parameter
MemoryTool > shouldConfirmExecute > should return confirmation details when memory file is not allowlisted for global scope
MemoryTool > shouldConfirmExecute > should return confirmation details when memory file is not allowlisted for project scope
MemoryTool > shouldConfirmExecute > should return false when memory file is already allowlisted for global scope
MemoryTool > shouldConfirmExecute > should return false when memory file is already allowlisted for project scope
MemoryTool > shouldConfirmExecute > should add memory file to allowlist when ProceedAlways is confirmed for global scope
MemoryTool > shouldConfirmExecute > should add memory file to allowlist when ProceedAlways is confirmed for project scope
MemoryTool > shouldConfirmExecute > should not add memory file to allowlist when other outcomes are confirmed
MemoryTool > shouldConfirmExecute > should handle existing memory file with content for global scope
MemoryTool > shouldConfirmExecute > should prompt for scope selection when scope is not specified
MemoryTool > shouldConfirmExecute > should show correct file paths in scope selection prompt
MemoryTool > getDescription > should return correct description for global scope
MemoryTool > getDescription > should return correct description for project scope
MemoryTool > getDescription > should show choice prompt when scope is not specified
